upanishad: The Upanishads, Part 1 (SBE01): Khândogya Upanishad... | Sacred Texts Archive
translator: Max Müller (Sacred Books of the East) — Public Domain
text: 1. 'The altar is man, O Gautama; its fuel speech itself, the smoke the breath, the light the tongue, the coals the eye, the sparks the ear.

upanishad: The Upanishads, Part 1 (SBE01): Khândogya Upanishad... | Sacred Texts Archive
translator: Max Müller (Sacred Books of the East) — Public Domain
text: 2. 'On that altar the Devas (prâ n as) offer food. From that oblation rises seed.
